title: 关于英语中音译外来词复数
author: shui_jin
txt_content: 最近遇到一个问题,jiaozi,zongzi,baozi这些音译词是单复数同形,还是不可数名词,还是直接加-s,-es这种常规方式?

replies.author: PercyDan
replies.txt_content:
饺子：Dumpling
粽子：Rice dumpling
**不知道（

replies.author: shui_jin
replies.txt_content:
PercyDan 发表于 2020-6-26 17:15
饺子：Dumpling
粽子：Rice dumpling
**不知道（
我是说,如果直接jiaozi这种上来,是a jiaozi ,还是a jiaozis

replies.author: PercyDan
replies.txt_content:
shui_jin 发表于 2020-6-26 17:27
我是说,如果直接jiaozi这种上来,是a jiaozi ,还是a jiaozis
不要用这种不标准单词

replies.author: shui_jin
replies.txt_content:
PercyDan 发表于 2020-6-26 17:30
不要用这种不标准单词
教科书上就这么用啊???

replies.author: Vocaloidkasa
replies.txt_content:
一般不加
一个饺子就A jiaozi
jiaozi dumpling
 没有复数形态？

replies.author: PercyDan
replies.txt_content:
shui_jin 发表于 2020-6-26 17:31
教科书上就这么用啊???
？？？？这哪门子教科书

replies.author: shui_jin
replies.txt_content: dumpling泛指皮包馅,不特指饺子

replies.author: 深拥v
replies.txt_content: 前提是你这几个词真的存在

replies.author: shui_jin
replies.txt_content: 现在英语很多这种汉语词汇拼音表达啊
